summary:
This mod adds several drinking fountains around Skyrim. I've made a custom 3D model of these fountains.
You're free feel to use in your mods. Just PM me and add my nickname in your credits.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/t94iid68u93u5py/manny.png?dl=1&token_hash=AAEIEPhxKj2lO3-1wXsAl9Vypgf6k4TsVc3sxuYWQTLS1Q[/img]
[img]http://s18.postimage.org/vt8inz4uh/titolo.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://SkyrimGEMS.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_animated.gif[/img][/url]
[size=4][b](Category: 400 - Realism)[/b][/size][/center]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod adds several drinking fountains around Skyrim. I've made a custom 3D model of these fountains.
When you "activate" a fountain, it will give you three bottles of water and if you play in 3rd person you can see an animation.
The animation I've used is the "idleTake", however in CK there are a "idleDrinkingFountain" animation but it does nothing :(
When the fountain gives you the three bottles, you have to wait the respawn (10 days) if you want again the bottles.
You're free feel to use in your mods. Just PM me and add my nickname in your credits.


[center]
[size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31598]German version[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30513]Polish version[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26228]Patch for Realistic Needs and Diseases available![/url]
Download the patch from download section of that mod


There is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68982]Realistic Needs and Diseases 2.0[/url] too.
Please read carefully the instructions on the page.[/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34010]Dragonborn expansion patch[/url][/center]

[center]
[img]http://s16.postimage.org/o19z0qsgl/2012_09_17_00007.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s10.postimage.org/gwp2yoox5/2012_09_17_00009.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s12.postimage.org/ai9cnuzdp/2012_09_17_00002.jpg[/img][/center]

* INSTALL *
Unpack, activate it by the Menu Launcher and enjoy!

* UNINSTALL *
Just delete the ESP and BSA

* BUGS *
Please report to me any bugs (misplaced drinking fountains, etc.)
author: MannyGT
